weekly_top_story.headline: South Carolina Measles Outbreak Expands By 200+, Reaches 646 Cases
weekly_top_story.summary: South Carolina reported 212 new measles cases in the past week, totaling 646 and threatening to become the largest U.S. outbreak in decades, highlighting urgent public health challenges amid vaccination gaps.

stories.headline: Congress Reaches Deal To Avoid Trump Cuts, Boost HHS Spending
stories.summary: Congress finalized a deal boosting HHS funding by $210 million over FY 2025 while including PBM reforms, hospital billing transparency, and Medicare coverage for multi-cancer screening tests, stabilizing key healthcare programs amid budget pressures.

stories.headline: House Committee on the Budget to Hold Hearing on Skyrocketing Health Care Costs
stories.summary: The House Budget Committee scheduled a January 21 hearing titled 'Reverse the Curse: Skyrocketing Health Care Costs,' signaling potential legislative action on escalating expenses affecting providers and patients nationwide.
